mapper.select: SELECT a.authortyId authortyId,a.parentAuthortyId parentAuthortyId,a.authortyName authortyName,a.authortyDescription authortyDescription,a.authortyUrl authortyUrl FROM tb_user u LEFT JOIN tb_user_authorty ua ON u.userId = ua.userId LEFT JOIN tb_authorty a ON ua.authortyId = a.authortyId WHERE u.loginAccount = #{loginAccount}
